column1: This is a list showing the most populous cities in Pakistan as of the 2017 Census of Pakistan. City populations found in this list only refer to the population found within the city's defined limits and any adjacent cantonment

column3: and from the Azad Jammu and Kashmir Planning & Development Department (or the PND AJK) for cities inside Azad Kashmir.As per the 2017 Census of Pakistan

column13: and one in Islamabad Capital Territory. It is unknown whether Gilgit-Baltistan has any city with over 100
